General.Name: Securitag Assembly Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Securitag Assembly Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells RFID transponders in Taiwan and internationally. It offers cards; keyfobs; tags; and NFC sensor-enabled tag products, as well as metal, non-metal, NFC, tamper proof, and rain RFID labels. The company also provides value-added services, such as thermal transfer printing or encoding on used chips. It serves clients in access control, healthcare, automation, logistic, industrial, entertainment, and NFC markets. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
